description:
With this plugin you are able to create the glass effect and assign to HTML elements according to their ID attribute. 

https://bubble.io/page?type=page&name=glasseffectpage&id=glasseffect-application&tab=tabs-1
name: Glass Effect
plugin_instructions:
To use it, please turn on the ID attribute on settings. More information here:
https://forum.bubble.io/t/how-do-you-enable-an-id-attribute-to-a-input-box-or-any-item/112195
